entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
